markdownRemark.html: For great views of Malaga City, take a ride on the ferris wheel located at the Malaga Port. The ferris wheel is 70 metres high and acommodate up to 8 people in a cabin.

frontmatter.title: Ferris Wheel in Malaga
frontmatter.description: Ferris Wheel in Malaga - For great views of Malaga City, take a ride on the ferris wheel located at the Malaga Port. The ferris wheel is 70 metres high and acommodate up to 8 people in a cabin.
frontmatter.address: Puerto de Málaga, Muelle de Heredia, s/n, 29001 Málaga
